summary: I HAVE A 1994 FORD RANGER.  THE TRUCK AFTER BEING PARKED FOR LONG AND OR SHORT PERIODS WILL NOT START, ONLY CRANK.  I HAVE REPLACED THE FUEL RELAY, FUEL PUMP, CRANK SENSOR.  THIS IS AN INTERMITTENT PROBLEM.  MY CAR HAS BEEN CHECKED BY THREE DIFFERENT TECHS AND COULD NOT FIND ANY CODES TO FIX THE PROBLEM.  THEIR OPINION WAS EITHER THE IGNITION MODULE OR COMPUTER.    *NLM
